company.label: Besten Chemicals
company.title: Innovative Chemical Solutions
paragraphs: In Roman philosophy, the Latin word Salus depicts the Goddess of health and medicine while in Eastern philosophy Zen is the concept signifying balance, harmony and inner peace.
Besten Chemicals Additives provides a perfect blend of these two concepts to provide solutions to customer's problems thereby protecting both mother nature and human beings in the best possible way.

productDetail.sectionTitle: These products provide multiple roles of

preservatives.name: Preservatives
preservatives.description: Our preservatives are designed to extend the shelf life of your products while maintaining their quality and safety.
preservatives.fullDescription: Our preservatives are designed to extend the shelf life of your products while maintaining their quality and safety. Engineered to inhibit the growth of microorganisms, our preservatives ensure that your goods remain fresh and effective from production to consumption.
preservatives.whyChoose: With our expertise in microbiological testing and certification, we guarantee that our preservatives deliver exceptional efficacy and reliability. Partner with us to enhance your product's durability and maintain its quality, giving you and your customers peace of mind.

surfactants.name: Surfactants
surfactants.description: Advanced surfactants that reduce surface tension and improve product performance.
surfactants.fullDescription: Our surfactants are formulated to reduce surface tension effectively, enabling superior wetting and spreading properties. These versatile compounds enhance the performance of cleaning products, personal care items, and industrial applications.

benefits.title: Emulsification
benefits.description: Better mixing of oil and water

surfactants.whyChoose: Our surfactants are scientifically formulated to deliver consistent performance while maintaining environmental responsibility.

defoamers.name: Defoamers
defoamers.description: Effective defoaming agents that eliminate foam in industrial and consumer applications.
defoamers.fullDescription: Our defoamers are engineered to quickly and effectively eliminate foam formation in various industrial and consumer applications. They ensure smooth operations and optimal product quality.
defoamers.whyChoose: Our defoaming solutions are trusted by industry leaders for their reliability and effectiveness in challenging applications.

wetting-agents.name: Wetting Agents
wetting-agents.description: Advanced wetting agents that improve surface contact and adhesion properties.
wetting-agents.fullDescription: Our wetting agents enhance the contact between liquids and solid surfaces, improving absorption, spreading, and adhesion properties. Ideal for coatings, textiles, and agricultural applications.
wetting-agents.whyChoose: Our wetting agents provide superior performance and consistency across diverse applications.

pre-treatment.name: Pre-Treatment Chemicals
pre-treatment.description: Specialized pre-treatment chemicals for surface preparation and metal processing.
pre-treatment.fullDescription: Our pre-treatment chemicals are designed to prepare surfaces for subsequent processes, ensuring optimal adhesion, corrosion resistance, and overall quality. Suitable for metal, plastic, and composite materials.
pre-treatment.whyChoose: Our pre-treatment solutions ensure superior surface preparation for maximum durability and performance.
